Metronomi.Logic

Class Metronome

  • java.lang.Object
    • Metronomi.Logic.Metronome

  • public class Metronome
extends Object
    Metronome implements core logic, responds to UI calls and controls the Rod object.
    Author:
    Leevi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean canStart
      canStart removes a UI bug that confuses the beat timing.
      boolean canStop
      canStop removes a UI bug that confuses the beat timing.
      static int tempoStep
      tempoStep defines the amount of bpm change per appropriate command.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Metronome()
      Initializer sets every value to a static default.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canStart() 
      boolean canStop() 
      void changeSignature(SignaturesEnum newSignature)
      changeSignature sets a new enumeration value to newSignature.
      void denyStarting()
      denyStartring sets canStart attribute to false.
      void denyStopping()
      denyStopping sets canStop attribute to false.
      int getBpm() 
      long getDelay() 
      Rod getRod() 
      boolean isRunning() 
      void setBpm(int bpm)
      Set beats per minute and convert it to milliseconds.
      void setSignature()
      setSignature switches the signature enumeration and sets bar attribute to match an appropriate value.
      void start()
      start will fire a loop that runs the metronome clicks.
      void stop()
      stop ends the thread that was created in start method.
      void swing()
      swing prints the details of the metronome per every beat, and calls rod to play a sound after a sleep delay has been executed.

    • Method Detail

      • setSignature

        public void setSignature()
        setSignature switches the signature enumeration and sets bar attribute to match an appropriate value.
        See Also:
        SignaturesEnum

      • changeSignature

        public void changeSignature(SignaturesEnum newSignature)
        changeSignature sets a new enumeration value to newSignature.
        Parameters:
        newSignature, - SignaturesEnum that defines the bar attribute, which itself defines the time signature.
        See Also:
        SignaturesEnum

      • start

        public void start()
        start will fire a loop that runs the metronome clicks. Control component creates a new thread for the start method to run on.
        See Also:
        KeyboardListener

      • stop

        public void stop()
        stop ends the thread that was created in start method.
        See Also:
        start()

      • swing

        public void swing()
        swing prints the details of the metronome per every beat, and calls rod to play a sound after a sleep delay has been executed.
        See Also:
        Rod

      • getRod

        public Rod getRod()
        Returns:
        rod, object which plays sound files
        See Also:
        Rod

      • getBpm

        public int getBpm()
        Returns:
        beats per minute, value that defines delay.
